to_address: "'Speakup is a screen review system for Linux.'" <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: RE: fc installation?
body:
One little correction Janina.  That is unless you want to do a live cd they
can be installed also.  But they can only be installed as a new installation
only you must have the Dvd for upgrading purposes.

Scott



-----Original Message-----
From: speakup-bounces@braille.uwo.ca [mailto:speakup-bounces@braille.uwo.ca]
On Behalf Of Janina Sajka
Sent: Friday, June 01, 2007 10:19 PM
To: Speakup is a screen review system for Linux.
Subject: Re: fc installation?

Littlefield, Tyler writes:
> that was my question, is if I could download cd 1, or if I had to get all
6
Beginning with Fedora 7 there are no longer CD images. Only DVD images.
